TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you can only levitate things 0.00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001% of your total body weight.

I wish for a private jet.

Granted, it is attacked by the kraken and is sent into the sun

I wish school wasn't soooo boring
Granted. School is 0.0000000000000000000001% less boring

Still better then nothing

U no have wish!?!?!? T_T

Hug apocalypse:

(>o.o)> (>o.o)>

(>o.o)> (>o.o)>

(>o.o)> (>o.o)>

I wish Jeb would prevent the apocalypse

Granted, he causes another one straight afterwards

I wish for a Skylon spaceplane that works perfectly and doesn't get shot down.

Granted, it gets srbd down by Jeb instead

I wish Jeb wasn't about to crash into the VAB...

granted, he crashes into the SPH instead

I wish SRB's had gimble

Edit: Great minds think alike eh leon?

Granted, the thrust tears the rockets apart.

I wish for Kerbin and Kerbals to be real.

Edit: Yep, Atheu

Edited May 17, 2013 by LeonG17

Granted. He crashes into the hangar instead.

Bah, ninjaed. Sure, but they're blue instead of green, which is clearly a dealbreaker.

I wish there were more cool villains.

Granted. they succede in destroying the world.

I wish i would stop forgetting to wish.

Granted, you remember to wish but can't think of what to wish for.

I wish to be able to think of an interesting wish

@ Rage: granted you forget to corrupt a wish

@ Leon: Granted You figure it out, but immediately forget what you wanted to wish for

I wish a 64 bit version of KSP would come out

Granted, but it is invaded and taken over by an army of space krakens

I wish Jeb would crash into my school right now

Granted, He lands on you

I wish there were female kerbals

Granted, you are inside it.

I wish that people would stop sniping me.

Granted, but I snipe you one last time

I wish school would end already

Granted. The FBI interrogates you for ending the life of the guy named School.

I wish to know if you go to KLein Oak.

Granted, but you'll get yourself killed in the process.

I wish for an Audi R8.

(crap, ninja'd)

Wait what? That made no sense to me, but granted... Eh I can't even come up with anything

I wish I was the leader of the kerbals

Granted. Jeb is leading an SRB rebellion against you.

I wish to expalin to Deadpan that i'm at school too.

Granted but I don't get it... Ehhhhhhhhhhhh *zzzzzz*

I wish I could play ksp right now...

Granted. You can't even reach orbit due to every square meter of space being occupied by debris, inexplicibly.

I wish for what ever the next guy wishes for.

Deep Space Kraken:

Granted, but I eat you nom nom nom

I wish for chocolate

Granted, everyone eats it.

I wish for Jeb.

Granted, but he crashes through your room on an SRB

I wish for no school
